name: Epacha Game Lodge and Spa

reviews.text: Wonderful place on the hills near Etocha national park in a private nature reserve. It has several chalets with great space, well decorated and beautiful views. The main facilities( spa, restaurant, swiming pool, etc) are outstanding. The staff is very friendly and the food is great!!
reviews.title: Wonderful place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It worth the price, and i hope to come back soon...
reviews.title: Did not Deliver

aka: Epacha Game Hotel Etosha National Park
description: Epacha Game Lodge & Spa is situated on the 21 000 ha Epacha Game Reserve. Each of the individually decorated en-suite chalets has its own private balcony, complete with a breathtaking view across the bush.All chalets are equipped with air-conditioning, mini bar, safe, ceiling fan and coffee and tea facilities.In keeping with the Victorian era in Africa, all chalets are furnished with antiques & decorated in subtle, relaxing colors. Guests can spend time relaxing in our lounge overlooking a waterhole or in the library, smoking room, billiard room or at our pool bar, be rejuvenated by stress relieving therapies in the Mystique Spa, which offers the following facilities: sauna, Jacuzzi, steam room, splash pool, thelaso therapy room, treatment rooms or outside treatment areas.
